data.system_settings: Android 4.4.4, v3.3.0, Xperia E4g *(may only be a pre-Lollipop issue)*
data.actual_result: Visual weirdness as code blocks are rendered on top of header and message box
data.expected_result: Code block is rendered behind channel name header (section at top) or message box (section at bottom)
data.short_description: Code blocks cause visual glitches over header and message box when scrolled to over those sections
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a code block (the one with three backticks) - Scroll up or down until code block is scrolled off screen
